#text:
The OL-in-One Compass has a wide variety of uses, for many targets and purposes.
What do you wanna try out?

#headline: Get familiar with the key lenses of Ocean Literacy
#text: Use this mode to explore each OL Principle, Perspective and Dimension at varying levels of depths. Let your interest and curiosity guide you!
#instruction: Click on any wave ([WAVE-I]) to find out more about OL <hP>Principles</hP>, <hPe>Perspectives</hPe> and <hD>Dimension</hD>.

#headline: Find Ocean Literacy relevant resources and case-studies
#text: Use this mode to learn about diverse sea-/water-related activities, media and projects in terms of the OL Principle(s), Perpective(s) and Dimensions(s) they address.
#instruction:
Select the waves ([WAVE-I]) relevant for your search. Once done click on ‘Search’ or press ‘Enter’.

Use the switch in the Search bar to narrow or broaden your search.

#headline: Design/analyse an activity or project in OL terms
#text: Use this mode for retrospective analysis or brainstorming of sea-/water-related activities in terms of their OL outcome, and get an instantaneous visual report to share it.
#instruction:
What is/are the key Ocean trait(s) that your activity/project convey? What angle(s) does it adopt? How? Fostering which kind(s) of learning?

Select the most relevant waves accordingly.
